dreams.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
dreams.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

dreams.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
dreams.author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam

dreams.quote: Dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
dreams.author: T.E. Lawrence

dreams.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagines, he  will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
dreams.author: Henry David Thoreau

dreams.quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
dreams.author: Paul Valery

dreams.quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
dreams.author: Carl Sandburg

dreams.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic, it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
dreams.author: Colin Powell

dreams.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
dreams.author: James Dean

dreams.quote: Who looks outside, dreams, who looks inside, awakes.
dreams.author: Carl Jung

dreams.quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
dreams.author: Oscar Wilde

dreams.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
dreams.author: Langston Hughes

dreams.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
dreams.author: Walt Disney

dreams.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self discipline, and effort.
dreams.author: Jesse Owens

dreams.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
dreams.author: Tupac Shakur

dreams.quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision.
dreams.author: Janet Jackson

dreams.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
dreams.author: Anatole France

dreams.quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
dreams.author: Yoko Ono

dreams.quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream.
dreams.author: Vincent Van Gogh

dreams.quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
dreams.author: Joel Osteen

dreams.quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
dreams.author: Edgar Cayce

dreams.quote: So many dreams seems impossible, then they seem improbable, then we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
dreams.author: Christopher Reeve

dreams.quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
dreams.author: Malcolm Forbes

dreams.quote: Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.
dreams.author: Gloria Steinem

dreams.quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities.
dreams.author: Gloria Steinem

dreams.quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
dreams.author: Dalai Lama

dreams.quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
dreams.author: Anais Nin

dreams.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
dreams.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

dreams.quote: You can plant a dream.
dreams.author: Anne Campbell

dreams.quote: Ideologies seperates us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
dreams.author: Eugene Ionesco

dreams.quote: I'm a dreamer. I have a dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
dreams.author: Mike Tyson

dreams.quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
dreams.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

dreams.quote: When you have a dream that you cen't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it.
dreams.author: Harvey Mackay

dreams.quote: Remember, real dreams take work, take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
dreams.author: Harvey Mackay

dreams.quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
dreams.author: Usher

dreams.quote: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
dreams.author: Michael Korda

dreams.quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
dreams.author: John Barrymore

dreams.quote: You gotta have a dream If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
dreams.author: Oscar Hammerstein II

dreams.quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
dreams.author: Joseph Campbell

dreams.quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
dreams.author: Aldous Huxley

dreams.quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher… or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
dreams.author: Douglas Adams

dreams.quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You the  you choose to be.
dreams.author: Joy Page

dreams.quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind togethers.
dreams.author: Jack Kerouac

dreams.quote: My dreams were all my own, I accounted for them to nobody, they were my refuge when annoyed- my dearest pleasure when free.
dreams.author: Mary Shelley

dreams.quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
dreams.author: George Bernard Shaw

dreams.quote: Dreams can still come true, you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
dreams.author: Stefano Gabbana

dreams.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
dreams.author: Erma Bombeck

dreams.quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
dreams.author: Walter Scott

dreams.quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
dreams.author: Jim Valvano

dreams.quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
dreams.author: Eva Green

dreams.quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
dreams.author: Sigmund Freud

dreams.quote: Dream are true while they last…
dreams.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

dreams.quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
dreams.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

dreams.quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
dreams.author: Baltasar Gracian

dreams.quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
dreams.author: Mary Webb

family.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
family.author: Desmond Tutu

family.quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
family.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

family.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
family.author: George Bernard Shaw

family.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
family.author: Andre Maurois

family.quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
family.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

family.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
family.author: Lee Iacocca

family.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
family.author: Charles R. Swindoll

family.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood.
family.author: Richard Bach

family.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
family.author: David Odgen Stiers

family.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
family.author: Charles Kuralt

family.quote: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
family.author: John Ruskin

family.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
family.author: Michael J. Fox

family.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only and found in a nurturing family.
family.author: Viriginia Satir

family.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
family.author: Pope John XXII

family.quote: The family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
family.author: Alex Haley

family.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
family.author: Princess Diana

family.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
family.author: Barbara Bush

family.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
family.author: Guy Lafleur

family.quote: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious.
family.author: Gloria Steinem

family.quote: The family is one of nature's masterpiece.
family.author: George Santayana

family.quote: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss.. That's the trade-off. But I'll take it all.
family.author: Brad Pitt

family.quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
family.author: Jerry Seinfeld

family.quote: The foundation of family- that's where it all begins for me.
family.author: Faith Hill

family.quote: The family is the test of freedom, because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
family.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

family.quote: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
family.author: Will Durant

family.quote: One's family is the most important thing in life. They are the only people who'll be with me.
family.author: Robert Byrd

family.quote: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
family.author: Willie Stargell

family.quote: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.
family.author: Bob Ehrlich

family.quote: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
family.author: Jet Li

family.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
family.author: Walt Disney

family.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
family.author: Anita Baker

family.quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
family.author: Cary Grant

family.quote: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, not looking at the past but only to the future.
family.author: LaToya Jackson

family.quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
family.author: John Oates

family.quote: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
family.author: Ring Lardner

family.quote: Having family responsibilities and concerns just has to make you a more understanding person.
family.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

family.quote: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
family.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

family.quote: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.
family.author: Sandra Bullock

family.quote: My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
family.author: Bobby Darin

family.quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
family.author: Amos Oz

family.quote: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
family.author: Grace Kelly

family.quote: Family, nature and health all go together.
family.author: Olivia Newton John

family.quote: Belonging to a family that accepts you without question is the best feeling.
family.author: Anonymous

friendship.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
friendship.author: Marcel Proust

friendship.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
friendship.author: Walter Winchell

friendship.quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
friendship.author: Herodotus

friendship.quote: There is nothing in this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

friendship.quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
friendship.author: Helen Keller

friendship.quote: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
friendship.author: H.Jackson Brown Jr.

friendship.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

friendship.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
friendship.author: Hubert H. Humprey

friendship.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
friendship.author: Anais Nin

friendship.quote: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
friendship.author: Walt Whitman

friendship.quote: One of the most beautiful, qualities of true friendship us to understantd and to be understood.
friendship.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

friendship.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasure. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

friendship.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
friendship.author: Oprah Winfrey

friendship.quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
friendship.author: Henry Ford

friendship.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
friendship.author: Jim Morrison

friendship.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
friendship.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

friendship.quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends, who have given me a heart full of joy.
friendship.author: Charles R. Swindoll

friendship.quote: There are no strangers here. Only friends you haven’t yet met.
friendship.author: William Butler Yeats

friendship.quote: The friend in my adversity I shall always cherish most I can better trust those who helped to relieve the gloom of my dark hours.
friendship.author: Ulysses S. Grant

friendship.quote: True friends stab you in the front.
friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

friendship.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
friendship.author: Aristotle

friendship.quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those dew be tried before you give them your confidence.
friendship.author: George Washington

friendship.quote: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
friendship.author: Albert Schweitzer

friendship.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
friendship.author: Euripides

friendship.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obessession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
friendship.author: Ellie Wiesel

friendship.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
friendship.author: Mencius

friendship.quote: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
friendship.author: Abraham Lincoln

friendship.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
friendship.author: Alice Walker

friendship.quote: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests.
friendship.author: Chanakya

friendship.quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man frienship.
friendship.author: William Blake

friendship.quote: A true friends is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
friendship.author: Len Wein

friendship.quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod, my shadow does that much better.
friendship.author: Plutarch

friendship.quote: Be slow to fall into friendshipl but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
friendship.author: Socrates

friendship.quote: Friendship… is not something you learn in school.
friendship.author: Muhammad Ali

friendship.quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
friendship.author: Thomas Fuller

friendship.quote: It is not so much our friends help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
friendship.author: Epicurus

friendship.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

friendship.quote: True friendship multiplies the good life and divides its evils.
friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian

friendship.quote: To find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune, to keep him is a blessing.
friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian

friendship.quote: Some people go to priests, others to poetry, I to my friends.
friendship.author: Virginia Woolf

friendship.quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where no money won't go.
friendship.author: Margaret Walker

friendship.quote: A single rose can be my garden, a single friend, my world.
friendship.author: Leo Buscaglia

friendship.quote: Never explain- your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard

friendship.quote: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
friendship.author: Bill Watterson

friendship.quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
friendship.author: Henry Van Dyke

friendship.quote: A man's friendship are one of the best measures of his worth.
friendship.author: Charles Darwin

friendship.quote: Frienship is one of those things that give value to survival.
friendship.author: C.S.Lewis

friendship.quote: My friends are my estate.
friendship.author: Emily Dickinson

friendship.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m, that matter.
friendship.author: Marlene Dietrich

friendship.quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
friendship.author: John D. Rockefeller

friendship.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
friendship.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

friendship.quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubting of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

friendship.quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
friendship.author: John Leonard

friendship.quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
friendship.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

friendship.quote: I never considered a difference of opinion, in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.
friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

friendship.quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends.
friendship.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

friendship.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
friendship.author: Doug Larson

future.quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
future.author: Abraham Lincoln

future.quote: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
future.author: Jean de La Fontaine

future.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
future.author: Marcus Aurelius

future.quote: Predictions is very difficult, especially if it's about the future
future.author: Niels Bohr

future.quote: You can't connect the dots looking forward, you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust the dots will somehow connect in your future.
future.author: Steve Jobs

future.quote: You have to trust your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
future.author: Steve Jobs

future.quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
future.author: Mike Murdock

future.quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don’t have time to feel sorry for myself nor complain. I'm going to press on.
future.author: Barack Obama

future.quote: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice.
future.author: William Jennings Bryan

future.quote: Destiny is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
future.author: William Jennings Bryan

future.quote: There is always one moment in childhood when the door opens and lets the future in.
future.author: Graham Greene

future.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
future.author: William Shakespeare

future.quote: I don't know what the future may hold, but I know who holds the future.
future.author: Ralph Abernathy

future.quote: If you think in terms of a year, plant a seed, if in terms of ten years, plant trees, if in terms of 100 years, teach the people.
future.author: Confucius

future.quote: Let us put our minds together and see what life we can make for our children.
future.author: Sitting Bull

future.quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
future.author: Pope John Paul II

future.quote: Only you can control your future.
future.author: Dr.Seuss

future.quote: As human beings who have learnt how to turn our common suffering into hope for the future.
future.author: Nelson Mandela

future.quote: The distinction between the past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
future.author: Albert Einstein

future.quote: I have realized that the past and the future are real illusions, that they exist in  the present, which is what there is and all there is.
future.author: Alan Watts

future.quote: In this bright future you can't forget your past.
future.author: Bob Marley

future.quote: The future ain't what it used to be.
future.author: Yogi Berra

future.quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
future.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

future.quote: Control your own destiny or someone else will.
future.author: Jack Welch

future.quote: Map out your future- but do it in pencil.
future.author: Jon Bon Jovi

future.quote: The road ahead is as long as you make it. Make it worth the trip.
future.author: Jon Bon Jovi

future.quote: Neither wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
future.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

future.quote: The past, the present, and the future are really one they are today.
future.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

future.quote: The youth is the hope of our future
future.author: Jose Rizal

future.quote: If we open a quarrel between past and present, we shall find that we have lost the future.
future.author: Winston Churchill

future.quote: Life is divided into three terms- that which was, which is, and which will be.
future.author: William Wordsworth

future.quote: Let us learn from the past to profit by the present, and from the present, to live better in the future.
future.author: William Wordsworth

future.quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
future.author: Edmund Burke

future.quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.
future.author: Marcel Pagnol

future.quote: There is never time in the future in which we will work out our salvation. The challenge is in the moment the time is always now.
future.author: James Baldwin

future.quote: What we need to do is always lean into the future, when the world changes around you and when it changes against you- what used to be a tail wind is not a head wind.
future.author: Jeff Bezos

future.quote: You have to lean into the future and figure out what to do because complaining isn't a strategy.
future.author: Jeff Bezos

future.quote: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there.
future.author: Charles Kettering

future.quote: If the future generations are to remember us more with gratitude than sorrow, we must leave them a glimpse of the world as it was created.
future.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

future.quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
future.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

future.quote: I don't try to describe the future. I try to prevent it.
future.author: Ray Bradbury

future.quote: Without forgiveness, there's no future.
future.author: Desmond Tutu

future.quote: The most glorious moments in your life are the days of despair when you feel a challenge to life and the promise of future accomplishments.
future.author: Gustave Falubert

future.quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You realize that you control your own destiny.
future.author: Albert Ellis

future.quote: Every man has his own destiny, the only imperative is to follow it, to accept it, no matter where it leads him.
future.author: Henry Miller

future.quote: Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again.
future.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

future.quote: Wisely improve the present, it is thine.
future.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

future.quote: Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.
future.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

future.quote: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care itself.
future.author: Andrew Carnegie

future.quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
future.author: Albert Camus

future.quote: To the influence of the Bible, we are indebted for all the progress made in true civilization and to this we must look as our guide in the future.
future.author: Ulysses S. Grant

future.quote: The wise man must remember that while he is a descendant of the past, he is a parent of the future.
future.author: Herbert Spencer

future.quote: The future is always beginning now.
future.author: Mark Strand

future.quote: I look to the future that's where I'm going to spend the rest of my life.
future.author: George Burns

future.quote: If you do not think about your future, you cannot have one.
future.author: John Galsworthy

future.quote: What matters is to live in the present, live now, for every moment is now.
future.author: Sai Baba

future.quote: It is your thoughts and acts of the moment that create your future.
future.author: Sai Baba

future.quote: The outline of your future path already exists, for you created its pattern by your past.
future.author: Sai Baba

future.quote: The future has a way of arriving unannounced.
future.author: George Will

future.quote: Yesterday is a canceleld check. Today is cash on the line. Tomorrow is a promissory note.
future.author: Hank Stram

future.quote: Enjoy present pleasures in such a way as not to injure future ones.
future.author: Seneca

future.quote: I'm not sure what the future holds but I do know that I'm going to be positive and not wake up  feeling desperate.
future.author: Nicole Kidman

future.quote: It is what it is, it's not what it should have been, not what it could have been, it is what it is.
future.author: Anonymous

future.quote: There's no present. There's only the immediate future and the recent past.
future.author: George Carlin

future.quote: The child becomes largely what he is taught; hence we must watch what we teach, and how we live.
future.author: Jane Addams

future.quote: I know of no way of judging the future but by the past.
future.author: Patrick Henry

happiness.quote: Laughter is the only cure for grief.
happiness.author: Robert Fulghum

happiness.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
happiness.author: Marcus Aurelius

happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready made it. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
happiness.author: Abraham Lincoln

happiness.quote: Happiness depends opun ourselves.
happiness.author: Aristotle

happiness.quote: Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
happiness.author: Denis Waitley

happiness.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

happiness.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and the be loved.
happiness.author: George Sand

happiness.quote: If you want to be happy, be.
happiness.author: Leo Tolstoy

happiness.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
happiness.author: Omar Khayyam

happiness.quote: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation.
happiness.author: Martha Washington

happiness.quote: I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstances but by our disposition.
happiness.author: Martha Washington

happiness.quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength; joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
happiness.author: Mother Teresa

happiness.quote: We are no longer happy, so soon as we wish to be happier.
happiness.author: Walter Savage Landor

happiness.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go, other whenever they go.
happiness.author: Oscar Wilde

happiness.quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy that makes happiness.
happiness.author: Charles Spurgeon

happiness.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
happiness.author: Richard Bach

happiness.quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
happiness.author: George Orwell

happiness.quote: I have the power to make me happy or unhappy. I just have one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it.
happiness.author: Groucho Marx

happiness.quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
happiness.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

happiness.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
happiness.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

happiness.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
happiness.author: Sydney J. Harris

happiness.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds, well done, the zest of creating things new.
happiness.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

happiness.quote: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
happiness.author: Benjamin Disraeli

happiness.quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yatch big enough to pull up right alongside it.
happiness.author: David Lee Roth

happiness.quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
happiness.author: Epictetus

happiness.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
happiness.author: Thomas Merton

happiness.quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
happiness.author: Lord Byron

happiness.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
happiness.author: Guillaurme Apollinaire

happiness.quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
happiness.author: Clare Boothe Luce

happiness.quote: Happiness is an inside job.
happiness.author: William Arthur Ward

happiness.quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
happiness.author: Henry Ward Beecher

happiness.quote: Happiness makes up in heights for what it lacks in length.
happiness.author: Robert Frost

happiness.quote: The moment of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
happiness.author: Ashely Montagu

happiness.quote: Happiness isn't something you experience, it's something you remember.
happiness.author: Oscar Levant

happiness.quote: Happiness is the state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of the one's values.
happiness.author: Ayn Rand

happiness.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
happiness.author: Carl Sandburg

happiness.quote: Plenty of people miss their share of happiness, not because they never found it, but because they didn't stop to enjoy it.
happiness.author: William Feather

happiness.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
happiness.author: John Barrymore

happiness.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
happiness.author: Bertrand Russell

happiness.quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
happiness.author: Julia Roberts

happiness.quote: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse.
happiness.author: Adam Smith

happiness.quote: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.
happiness.author: Alice Walker

happiness.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
happiness.author: Linus Pauling

happiness.quote: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it.
happiness.author: Bernard Meltzer

happiness.quote: Be happy with what  you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
happiness.author: William E. Gladstone

happiness.quote: Happiness is  the absence of striving for happiness.
happiness.author: Zhuangzi

happiness.quote: To make at least one person happy every day, it is a treasure in a lifetime.
happiness.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

happiness.quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is  to make each day happy.
happiness.author: Deepak Chopra

happiness.quote: The most worth while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
happiness.author: Robert Baden Powell

happiness.quote: We must fight in order to conquer happiness.
happiness.author: Alexandre Dumas

happiness.quote: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness.
happiness.author: Dennis Prager

happiness.quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society.
happiness.author: Princess Diana

happiness.quote: The first recipe for happiness is to avoid too lengthy meditation on  the past.
happiness.author: Andre Maurois

happiness.quote: The secret of happiness is something to do.
happiness.author: John Burroughs

happiness.quote: Love is trembling happiness.
happiness.author: Khalil Gilbran

happiness.quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing  I know.
happiness.author: Ernest Hemingway

happiness.quote: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice.
happiness.author: Ben Jonson

happiness.quote: Happiness is not a goal, it is a by-product.
happiness.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspirational.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched- they must be felt with the heart.

inspirational.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine- and shadows will fall behind you.

inspirational.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

inspirational.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.

inspirational.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.

inspirational.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surreders.

inspirational.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

inspirational.quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.

inspirational.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the scret of your success.

inspirational.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

inspirational.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are, it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.

inspirational.quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.

inspirational.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whome fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.

inspirational.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

inspirational.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.

inspirational.quote: Happiness never decreases by being shared.

inspirational.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

inspirational.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

inspirational.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.

inspirational.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

inspirational.quote: The only journey is the one within.

inspirational.quote: Let every dawn be to you as the beginning of life, and every setting sun be to you as its close.

inspirational.quote: If we did all things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.

inspirational.quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome,  to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

inspirational.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.

inspirational.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go, they merely determine where you start.

inspirational.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

life.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Life is too short for long tern grudges.

life.quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life

life.quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.

life.quote: To live is to think.

life.quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy fo the poor.

life.quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us.

life.quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.

life.quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.

life.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

life.quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.

life.quote: Your're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.

life.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person, it's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit.

life.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.

life.quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.

life.quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.

life.quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairytale.

life.quote: The good life in one inspired by love and guided by knowledge

life.quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.

life.quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death

life.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.

life.quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live

life.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.

life.quote: It takes half your life before you discover life a do it yourself project.

life.quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.

life.quote: I have found that if you life, life will love you back.
life.author: Arthur Rubinstein

life.quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?

love.quote: Love is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experience.

love.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.

love.quote: Love is a frienship set to music.

relationship.quote: He who is not in our hearts is far though he may be really nearby.
relationship.author: Chanakya

relationship.quote: Girls we love for what they are; young men for what they promise to be.
relationship.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

relationship.quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me.
relationship.author: Humphrey Bogart

relationship.quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
relationship.author: Anthony J.D'Angelo

relationship.quote: I love you, and because I love you. I would sooner have you hate me for telling the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
relationship.author: Pietro Aretino

relationship.quote: Who cares about the clouds when we're together? Just sing a song and bring the sunny weather.
relationship.author: Dale Evans

relationship.quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at the other's woe.
relationship.author: Homer

relationship.quote: We must learn to regard people less in light of what they do or omit to do, and more in the light of what  they suffer.
relationship.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

relationship.quote: Love can only truly be measured by actions.
relationship.author: Marian Keyes

relationship.quote: I am convinced that material things can contribute a lot, but if you don't have great friends and relatives who matter to you, matter things cease to be important.
relationship.author: David Rockefeller

relationship.quote: The heart of another is a dark forest, always, no matter how close it has been to one's own.
relationship.author: Willa Cather

relationship.quote: If so many men, so many minds, certainly so many hearts, so many kinds of love.
relationship.author: Leo Tolstoy

bib_inspirational.author: Isaiah 40:29

bib_inspirational.quote: Even youths grow tired and weary, and young men stumble and fall;
bib_inspirational.author: Isaiah 40:30

bib_inspirational.quote: but those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
bib_inspirational.author: Isaiah 40:31

bib_inspirational.quote: The LORD will keep you from all harm— he will watch over your life;
bib_inspirational.author: Psalms 121:7

bib_inspirational.quote: the LORD will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.
bib_inspirational.author: Psalms 121:8

bib_inspirational.quote: May he give you the desire of your heart and make all your plans succeed.
bib_inspirational.author: Psalms 20:4

bib_inspirational.quote: " ' "The LORD bless you and keep you;
bib_inspirational.author: Numbers 6:24

bib_inspirational.quote: the LORD make his face shine on you and be gracious to you;
bib_inspirational.author: Numbers 6:25

bib_inspirational.quote: the LORD turn his face toward you and give you peace." '
bib_inspirational.author: Numbers 6:26

bib_inspirational.quote: And so we know and rely on the love God has for us. God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God, and God in them.
bib_inspirational.author: 1 John 4:16

bib_inspirational.quote: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
bib_inspirational.author: 2 Corinthians 3:17

bib_inspirational.quote: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.
bib_inspirational.author: Ephesians 4:32

bib_inspirational.quote: Greater love has no one than this: to lay down one's life for one's friends.
bib_inspirational.author: John 15:13

bib_inspirational.quote: For now we see only a reflection as in a mirror; then we shall see face to face. Now I know in part; then I shall know fully, even as I am fully known.
bib_inspirational.author: 1 Corinthians 13:12

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Matthew 21:22

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Romans 10:17

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Hebrews 11:6

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Hebrews 11:1

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: You believe that God is one; you do well. Even the demons believe—and shudder!
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: James 2:19

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: So now faith, hope, and love abide, these three; but the greatest of these is love.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Corinthians 13:13

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: And if I have prophetic powers, and understand all mysteries and all knowledge, and if I have all faith, so as to remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Corinthians 13:2

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Be watchful, stand firm in the faith, act like men, be strong.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Corinthians 16:13

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: That your faith might not rest in the wisdom of men but in the power of God.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Corinthians 2:5

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Everyone who believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God, and everyone who loves the Father loves whoever has been born of him.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 John 5:1

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 John 5:4

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: But in your hearts honor Christ the Lord as holy, always being prepared to make a defense to anyone who asks you for a reason for the hope that is in you; yet do it with gentleness and respect.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Peter 3:15

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called and about which you made the good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 1 Timothy 6:12

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For we walk by faith, not by sight.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 2 Corinthians 5:7

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: 2 Timothy 4:7

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Ephesians 2:8

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: In all circumstances take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming darts of the evil one.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Ephesians 6:16

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Yet we know that a person is not justified by works of the law but through faith in Jesus Christ, so we also have believed in Christ Jesus, in order to be justified by faith in Christ and not by works of the law, because by works of the law no one will be justified.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Galatians 2:16

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Galatians 2:20

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Behold, his soul is puffed up; it is not upright within him, but the righteous shall live by his faith.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Habakkuk 2:4

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: By faith Noah, being warned by God concerning events as yet unseen, in reverent fear constructed an ark for the saving of his household. By this he condemned the world and became an heir of the righteousness that comes by faith.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: Hebrews 11:7

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Looking to Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith, who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is seated at the right hand of the throne of God.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For you know that the testing of your faith produces steadfastness.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: James 1:3

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: But let him ask in faith, with no doubting, for the one who doubts is like a wave of the sea that is driven and tossed by the wind.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: So also faith by itself, if it does not have works, is dead.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: James 2:17

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: You see that a person is justified by works and not by faith alone.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.author: John 1:1

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: I am the bread of life; whoever comes to me shall not hunger, and whoever believes in me shall never thirst.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: I told you that you would die in your sins, for unless you believe that I am he you will die in your sins.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: For nothing will be impossible with God.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Increase our faith!

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: What is impossible with men is possible with God.

bib_powerful_scriptures_on_faith.quote: Go your way; your faith has made you well.

bib_powerful_verses_to_live_by.quote: In the world, you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.

bib_powerful_verses_to_live_by.quote: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers, neither height nor depth, nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord

bib_powerful_verses_to_live_by.quote: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God. And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus

bib_powerful_verses_to_live_by.quote: I sought the Lord, and he answered me and delivered me from all my fears. Those who look to him are radiant, and their faces shall never be ashamed. Oh, taste and see that the Lord is good. Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him

For the pagans run after all these things, and your heavenly Father knows that you need them. But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well. Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own

bib_strength.quote: God is within her, she will not fall; God will help her at break of day.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 46:5

bib_strength.quote: My grace is all you need, for my power is the greatest when you are weak.
bib_strength.author: 2 Corinthians 12:9

bib_strength.quote: You, God, are awesome in your sanctuary; the God of Israel gives power and strength to his people.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 68:35

bib_strength.quote: My soul is weary with sorrow; strengthen me according to your word.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 119:28

bib_strength.quote: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
bib_strength.author: Philippians 4:13

bib_strength.quote: Ah, Sovereign Lord, you have made the heavens and the earth by your great power and outstretched arm. Nothing is too hard for you.
bib_strength.author: Jeremiah 32:17

bib_strength.quote: But I will sing of your strength, in the morning I will sing of your love; for you are my fortress, my refuge in times of trouble.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 59:16

bib_strength.quote: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me. My heart leaps for joy, and with my song I praise him.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 28:7

bib_strength.quote: She is clothed with strength and dignity; she can laugh at the days to come.
bib_strength.author: Proverbs 31:25

bib_strength.quote: May the God who gives endurance and encouragement give you the same attitude of mind toward each other that Christ Jesus had.
bib_strength.author: Romans 15:5

bib_strength.quote: Therefore encourage one another and build each other up, just as in fact you are doing.
bib_strength.author: Thessalonians 5:11

bib_strength.quote: I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
bib_strength.author: John 16:33

bib_strength.quote: I lift up my eyes to the mountains—where does my help come from? My help comes from the Lord, the Maker of heaven and earth.
bib_strength.author: Psalm 121:1-2

bib_strength.quote: Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
bib_strength.author: Nehemiah 8:10

bib_strength.quote: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
bib_strength.author: Isaiah 41:10

bib_strength.quote: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has given me victory. This is my God, and I will praise him—my father's God, and I will exalt him.
bib_strength.author: Exodus 15:2

bib_strength.quote: Be strong and courageous; do not be frightened and do not be dismayed, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.
bib_strength.author: Joshua 1:9

bib_strength.quote: Surely God is my salvation; I will trust and not be afraid. The Lord, the Lord, is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
bib_strength.author: Isaiah 12:2

bib_strength.quote: He gives power to the weak and strength to the powerless.
bib_strength.author: Isaiah 40:29
